subject: My Name is Sir Camsey Paul (KS
body:
My Name is Sir Camsey Paul (KSC) based in Stoke-On-Trent, UK,where are you from? Are you a dedicated Christian? I needed someone that I could trust with charity work. I have been Diagnosed with Esophageal Cancer of the Lungs. According to my Doctor I will die in a moment.
I want you to Distribute these Funds to people that need it. I will wait here for your Response before I go ahead and inform my Lawyer about my intentions.

subject: Re: My Name is Sir Camsey Paul (KS
body:
Hello Sir Camsey Paul KSC,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. It's truly admirable that you're thinking of others and wanting to do charity work in such a difficult time. I'm curious, how did you come across my contact? And could you tell me more about the kind of charity work you have in mind?

Best wishes,
Patrick
